    title: 'Textarea',
    subtitle: 'The Textarea component represents a multi-line plain-text input element.',
    description:
        'The Textarea component is useful for enabling users to input a substantial amount of unstructured text, such as a comment on a review or feedback form.',
}

<CodeComponent filename="textarea.tsx" code="aW1wb3J0IHsgVGV4dGFyZWEgfSBmcm9tICJAZm9sZC1kZXYvY29yZSI7Cg==" />
```tsx
import { Textarea } from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('');
    return (<Textarea value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('')

    return (
        <Textarea
            value={text}
            height={100}
            className="f-scrollbar"
            placeholder="Write message..."
            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
        />
    )
}
```
### Select On Focus

export const SelectOnFocus = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('Hey there!');
    return (<Textarea selectOnFocus value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<SelectOnFocus />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="SelectOnFocus.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const SelectOnFocus = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('Hey there!')

    return (
        <Textarea
            selectOnFocus
            value={text}
            height={100}
            className="f-scrollbar"
            placeholder="Write message..."
            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
        />
    )
}
```
### Disabled

export const Disabled = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('');
    return (<Textarea disabled value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Disabled />
</div>

```tsx
export const Disabled = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('')

    return (
        <Textarea
            disabled
            value={text}
            height={100}
            className="f-scrollbar"
            placeholder="Write message..."
            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
        />
    )
}
```
### Auto Adjust Height

export const AutoAdjustHeight = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('');
    return (<Textarea autoAdjust value={text} maxHeight={300} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<AutoAdjustHeight />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="AutoAdjustHeight.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const AutoAdjustHeight = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('')

    return (
        <Textarea
            autoAdjust
            value={text}
            maxHeight={300}
            className="f-scrollbar"
            placeholder="Write message..."
            onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
        />
    )
}
```
### Sizes

export const Sizes = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('');
    return (<View column alignItems="flex-start" gap={10}>
            <Textarea size="xs" value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>
            <Textarea size="sm" value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>
            <Textarea size="md" value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>
            <Textarea size="lg" value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>
            <Textarea size="xl" value={text} height={100} className="f-scrollbar" placeholder="Write message..." onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Sizes />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Sizes.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Sizes = () => {
    const [text, setText] = useState('')

    return (
        <View
            column
            alignItems="flex-start"
            gap={10}>
            <Textarea
                size="xs"
                value={text}
                height={100}
                className="f-scrollbar"
                placeholder="Write message..."
                onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Textarea
                size="sm"
                value={text}
                height={100}
                className="f-scrollbar"
                placeholder="Write message..."
                onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Textarea
                size="md"
                value={text}
                height={100}
                className="f-scrollbar"
                placeholder="Write message..."
                onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Textarea
                size="lg"
                value={text}
                height={100}
                className="f-scrollbar"
                placeholder="Write message..."
                onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
            />
            <Textarea
                size="xl"
                value={text}
                height={100}
                className="f-scrollbar"
                placeholder="Write message..."
                onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}
            />
        </View>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
